summary:
This changes the Transmute Mineral Ore spell so that it begins transmuting your iron ore to silver ore first, then when no iron ore is left it begins transmuting the silver ore to gold ore.

Vanilla settings got annoying fast if you were trying to make lots of silver ore.

Someone requested I repost this mod on Nexus so her
descriptionHtml:
This changes the Transmute Mineral Ore spell so that it begins transmuting your iron ore to silver ore first, then when no iron ore is left it begins transmuting the silver ore to gold ore.

Vanilla settings got annoying fast if you were trying to make lots of silver ore.

Someone requested I repost this mod on Nexus so here it is. It can also be found on the Steam Workshop. Workshop version is located at http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=9776
author: FreezyGator
